name: Quraan
description: The Quran Listening Project is a web application that allows users to listen to all Quran recitations by various renowned reciters. The website provides easy navigation to select any surah (chapter) and reciter of choice, offering a seamless and user-friendly experience for Quran listeners. The platform is designed to be accessible for all users, ensuring that they can stream Quran recitations directly without the need for additional downloads. Additionally, the project also offers live streaming for Al-Quran Al-Kareem and Prophetic Hadith channels, providing users with a complete and enriched Islamic experience. This project aims to serve the community by providing an organized and reliable online Quran listening tool.

name: EasyShare
description: EasyShare is a web application for managing group savings programs where participants contribute a fixed amount, and one member receives the total collected amount in each cycle. The platform ensures transparency, automates payment tracking, and simplifies financial collaboration among members.

name: Store
description: Store is an inventory management system designed to streamline the process of managing stock and product quantities. The platform allows users to add products, transfer items between warehouses, and track sales seamlessly. Administrators can monitor remaining stock levels, ensuring efficient inventory control and accurate reporting. The user-friendly interface and robust backend make it an ideal solution for managing warehouses and product distribution effectively.

name: Rakamy
description: Rakamy is a platform designed for selling numbers with flexible pricing plans. It provides users with tools to browse available numbers, compare pricing options, and select the plan that best suits their needs. The platform ensures a seamless experience with interactive features and customizable options tailored to different business and personal requirements.

name: Update student data
description: Update student data is a student information management platform designed to streamline the process of updating student data. It enables administrators to efficiently edit, manage, and maintain accurate student records, ensuring that all information is up-to-date. The system is intuitive and user-friendly, making it easy to handle changes such as contact details, enrollment information, and academic records.

name: Permissions Absences
description: Permissions Absences is a comprehensive system for managing employee permissions and absences. The application includes tools for leave requests, approval workflows, and tracking employee attendance. The user-friendly dashboard ensures efficient management for HR teams.

name: Agazty
description: Agazty is a leave scheduling platform designed for employees to select and plan their vacation periods. It allows users to view available leave slots, choose their preferred vacation dates, and submit requests seamlessly.

name: Dragaty
description: Dragaty is a drag-and-drop page builder tool that allows users to create websites without any coding knowledge. The application includes pre-designed templates, customizable components, and integration with CMS platforms.

name: Student's Data Class List
description: Student's Data Class List is a system for managing student records and class lists. It includes features for adding, editing, and viewing student information, along with tools for generating reports and performance analytics.

name: Student's Absent Leave Early
description: Student's Absent Leave Early is an attendance tracking system that allows teachers to log student absences and early leaves. The application provides detailed analytics and reporting for better attendance management.

name: E3lany
description: E3lany is an online advertising platform that allows users to post and manage ads across various categories. The system includes advanced search and filtering features to ensure users can find relevant listings easily.

name: Kamal
description: Kamal is an educational platform that offers online courses, quizzes, and certification programs. The platform is designed to provide a rich learning experience with interactive content and progress tracking.

name: Blog
description: The Blog Project is a streamlined web application for publishing and managing articles. It allows users to register, create, and organize blog posts effortlessly. With a responsive and intuitive interface, the platform ensures an enjoyable writing and reading experience. The backend is built to handle efficient data management, user authentication, and seamless integration, making it a powerful tool for content creators. This project demonstrates the effective use of technologies like ReactJs, Bootstrap, Laravel, and MySQL to deliver a full-stack blogging solution.
